reason.tex:
%text Recall the following standard result \[ \quad \int_a^b f(x)\cdot dx = \int_a^b f(a+b-x)\cdot dx \] When applied to $\int_1^2 x^2\cdot dx$, one can see that % \begin{align}
\int_1^2 x^2\cdot dx &= \int_1^2 \left(1+2-x \right)^2\cdot dx \\ &= \int_1^2 \left(3-x \right)^2\cdot dx \end{align} %text %
